meanings.sent1: The multicolumn chart displayed various data in a clear way.
meanings.sent2: The report was organized in a multicolumn format for easy reading.
meanings.sent3: The multicolumn design of the building made it look modern and sleek.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a multicolumn structure, each idea neatly separated.
meanings.sent5: The multicolumn layout of the garden made it visually appealing and well-structured.

meanings.sent1: The newspaper article was presented in a multicolumn format.

meanings.sent3: The multicolumn arrangement of the room gave it a spacious feel.
meanings.sent4: The multicolumn structure of the webpage allowed for better organization of content.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had a multicolumn design to fit more information on each page.
